documents.document: Like, we didn’t grow up as bezzie m8s or anything but yknow - a family friend nonetheless

Our moms were childhood neighbours so I’ve known Simon Harris literally my whole life and I’m so damn proud of his work as minister for health. First he got my job title legally protected and then gave me bodily autonomy! #soundlad
